Title: Relates to the green roof tax abatement for certain properties in a city of one million or more persons
Summary: Removes certain soil depth requirements; raises the tax abatement rate of non-priority; extends the application deadline from 2023 to 2024 for purposes of the green roof tax abatement for certain properties in a city of one million or more persons.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to removing certain soil depth requirements, raising the tax abatement rate of non-priority and extending the application deadline from 2023 to 2024 for purposes of the green roof tax abatement for certain properties in a city of one million or more persons
